name: @GeekyRiolu/mcp_insta
description: Analyze Instagram engagement to extract insights on post comments, compare account metrics, identify potential leads, and generate detailed engagement reports. Empower your marketing and social media strategies with demographic extraction and comprehensive analytics. Use this toolkit to make data-driven decisions for Instagram growth and engagement optimization.

tools.name: analyze_post_comments
tools.description: Analyze comments on an Instagram post to identify sentiment, themes, and potential leads

postUrl.description: URL of the Instagram post to analyze

maxComments.description: Maximum number of comments to analyze (default: 100)

tools.name: compare_accounts
tools.description: Compare engagement metrics across different Instagram accounts

accounts.description: List of Instagram account handles to compare

tools.name: extract_demographics
tools.description: Extract demographic insights from users engaged with a post or account

sampleSize.description: Number of users to sample for demographic analysis (default: 50)

accountOrPostUrl.description: Instagram account handle or post URL to analyze

tools.name: identify_leads
tools.description: Identify potential leads based on engagement patterns

keywords.description: Keywords to look for in user comments or bio

minComments.description: Minimum number of comments from a user

minFollowers.description: Minimum number of followers a user should have

accountOrPostUrl.description: Instagram account handle or post URL to analyze

tools.name: generate_engagement_report
tools.description: Generate a comprehensive engagement report for an Instagram account
